OrgName.entry: DON VALLEY STADIUM - GYM AND AEROBICS

Desc.entry: Provides a variety of fitness classes including cardio exercise and circuit training. Facilities also include a 400m outdoor track, 75m indoor running track, Technogym fitness suite, stretch room, free weights area and conditioning rooms. Also has sauna.

ContactName.entry: Julie Mosely, Marketing/Christine Green, Fitness Manager

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 7am-9pm, Fri 7am-8.30pm, Sat & Sun 9am-5pm (opening times), Mon 5.30-6.30pm (Cardio Blast), 6-7.30pm (Run Ltd), 6.30-7pm (Abs unlimited), Tues 5.45-6.45pm (Energy Mix), Wed 5.30-6.30pm (cardio blast), 6-7.30pm (Run Ltd), 6.30-7pm (Abs unlimited), Thurs 6-7pm (FU circuit)
